DjangoÂ¶

Component Tested version(s)
Django 1.3

Because the packaged version of Django for Ubuntu is often behind the latest release, we install Django from source.

Set up staging area:

$ mkdir ~/djangoinstall
$ cd ~/djangoinstall

Download the latest version of Django from https://www.djangoproject.com/download/

$ wget http://media.djangoproject.com/releases/1.3/Django-1.3.1.tar.gz

Uncompress and install:

$ tar xzvf Django-1.3.1.tar.gz
$ cd Django-1.3.1
# sudo python setup.py install
